 Talk How to Pin on Pinterest   
 This wikiHow teaches you how to pin posts to boards on your Pinterest profile. For an easy way to pin items on a computer, consider installing the  "Pin It" button  for your browser. 
 Steps Edit 
 Method One of Four: Uploading Pins on Mobile Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a6\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-1.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/a6\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open Pinterest.  It's a red app with a white, stylized "P" on it. If you're logged into Pinterest, opening the app will take you to the home page (or, at times, the last tab you had open).
 If you aren't logged in, enter your email address and password, then tap  Log In . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4b\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/4\/4b\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Tap your profile icon.  It's the person-shaped icon that's in either the bottom-right corner of the screen (iPhone) or the top-right corner of the screen (Android).
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/2e\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/2e\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Tap  + .  This button is in the top-right corner of the screen. You'll see several upload options appear:
 Photo  - Opens your device's camera roll for you to select a photo or video. You may first need to tap  Allow  or  OK  to give Pinterest access to your camera roll. 
 Copied link  - Automatically takes you to your most recently copied link and displays any pin-compatible posts. 
 Website  - Allows you to  search for pin-compatible posts on a website  after entering the website's URL. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a0\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-4.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/a0\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Tap an upload option.  They're listed at the bottom of the screen.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9a\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-5.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/9\/9a\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Follow your upload option's procedure.  If you're uploading a photo, you'll be prompted to tap a photo from your device's camera roll; otherwise, you'll enter a website URL or be taken to one.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1b\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-6.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/1\/1b\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Tap an item you wish to pin.  This will open a page on which you can choose a board for your pin.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/77\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-7.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-7.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/7\/77\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-7.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 7 
 Tap a board.  Doing so will add the pin to your selected board.
 If you would rather create a board for your pin, tap  Create board  on this page instead. 
 You may first wish to enter a description for your pin in the "Add a description" box at the top of the screen. 
 Advertisement 
 Method Two of Four: Searching for Pins on Mobile Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fe\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-8.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/fe\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open Pinterest.  It's a red app with a white, stylized "P" on it. If you're logged into Pinterest, opening the app will take you to the home page (or, at times, the last tab you had open).
 If you aren't logged in, enter your email address and password, then tap  Log In . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f0\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-9.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-9.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/f0\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-9.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Tap the "Search" tab.  It's the magnifying glass icon that's at either the bottom of the screen (iPhone) or the top of the screen (Android).
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/da\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-10.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-10.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/d\/da\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-10.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Tap the "Search" bar.  You'll see this at the top of the screen.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/49\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-11.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-11.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/4\/49\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-11.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Type in a topic, a username, or another search query.  It should relate to items you'd like to pin. As you type, you should see search suggestions appear below the search bar.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/ae\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-12.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-12.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/ae\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-12.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Tap a search suggestion.  You can also tap your device's "Search" button to search for the word or phrase you typed.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e7\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-13.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-13.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/e7\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-13.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Tap a post you'd like to pin.  Doing so will open it.
 You may need to scroll down through the results to find the post you wish to pin. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9d\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-14.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-14.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/9\/9d\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-14.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 7 
 Tap  Save .  It's in the top-right corner of the screen.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/bd\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-15.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-15.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/b\/bd\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-15.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 8 
 Tap a board.  Doing so will pin your selected post to the board in question.
 You can also tap  Create board  to create a new one. 
 Advertisement 
 Method Three of Four: Uploading Pins on Desktop Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f1\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-16.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-16.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f1\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-16.jpg\/v4-760px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-16.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Go to the Pinterest website.  It's located at  https://www.pinterest.com/ . If you're already logged into Pinterest, this will open your home page.
 If you aren't logged into Pinterest, click  Log in  in the top-right corner of the page, enter your username and password, and click  Log in . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1e\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-17.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-17.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1e\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-17.jpg\/v4-760px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-17.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Click  + .  You'll see this in the bottom-right corner of the window. Doing so will prompt a pop-up menu in the bottom-right corner of the window.
 If you haven't downloaded the "Pin It" button, you may receive a notification asking you to download it. If so, click  Not now  and click  +  again. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6e\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-18.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-18.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6e\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-18.jpg\/v4-760px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-18.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click an upload option.  There are two options here:
 Upload a Pin  - Allows you to upload a photo or video from your computer. 
 Save from a website  - Allows you to  search for pin-compatible posts on a website . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/ff\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-19.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-19.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/ff\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-19.jpg\/v4-760px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-19.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Open the item you wish to pin.  Your process for doing so will vary depending on the option you selected:
 Upload a Pin  - Click  Choose photo , select a file location, click on a photo or video, and click  Open . 
 Save from a website  - Type a link into the text field in the "Save from a website" window, click  Next , and click  Save  in the top-right corner of the photo's icon. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d3\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-20.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-20.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d3\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-20.jpg\/v4-760px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-20.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Click a board's name.  Doing this will add your selected item to the board in question.
 You can also add a description to your uploaded item by clicking the text field below it on the left side of the page. 
 You can click  Create board  to add your item to a new board.

 Method Four of Four: Searching for Pins on Desktop Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f3\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-21.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-21.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f3\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-21.jpg\/v4-760px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-21.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Go to the Pinterest website.  It's located at  https://www.pinterest.com/ . If you're already logged into Pinterest, this will open your home page.
 If you aren't logged into Pinterest, click  Log in  in the top-right corner of the page, enter your username and password, and click  Log in . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a6\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-22.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-22.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a6\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-22.jpg\/v4-760px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-22.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Click the search bar.  You'll see this at the top of the page.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/2c\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-23.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-23.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/2c\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-23.jpg\/v4-760px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-23.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Type in a topic, a username, or another search query.  It should relate to items you'd like to pin. As you type, you should see search suggestions appear below the search bar.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d8\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-24.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-24.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d8\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-24.jpg\/v4-760px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-24.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Click a search suggestion.  You can also press  ↵  Enter  or  ⏎  Return  to search for your typed query.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/73\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-25.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-25.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/73\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-25.jpg\/v4-760px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-25.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Click  Save  on a post.  It's in the top-right corner of the post.
 You'll need to hover your mouse cursor over the post in order to see this option. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b4\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-26.jpg\/v4-460px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-26.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b4\/Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-26.jpg\/v4-760px-Pin-on-Pinterest-Step-26.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Click a board's name.  Doing this will add your selected item to the board in question.
 You can also add a description to your uploaded item by clicking the text field below it on the left side of the page. 
 You can click  Create board  to add your item to a new board.
